CustomField.description: Object event that will trigger the evaluation of the Triggered Send. Options are for when a new record for respective object is created, existing record is updated, or both created and updated
CustomField.formula: IF( et4ae5__Action__c == 'Insert', $Label.et4ae5__recIns , IF( et4ae5__Action__c == 'Update', $Label.et4ae5__recUpdt , IF(et4ae5__Action__c == 'Either', $Label.et4ae5__recUps , IF(et4ae5__Action__c == 'EitherSubsequently', $Label.et4ae5__recUpdtSub,''))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Object event that will trigger the evaluation of the Triggered Send. Options are for when a new record for respective object is created, existing record is updated, or both created and updated
CustomField.label: Trigger send when
